entry.summary: RT Brian H. Hough | brianhuff.eth/lens Literally so bullish on this! 👀💯🔥 Something big is launching soon within @developer_dao that includes: - DevRel best practices - BUIDLing with frens - Creating a personal brand - Launching a web3 portfolio Can you guess what it is? 👀 krinza.eth (🧱, 🚀): @dabit3 @0xtaetaehoho @DennisonBertram @camiinthisthang @thatguyintech @developer_dao +1. We have been onboarding kickass content creators, buildoors and educators within the guild. Many individual contributors are now full-time devrel engineers 🎉 👀 Alpha? We are soon launching a devrel incubator. https://twitter.com/kayprasla/status/1562476703938924547?s=20&t=olJftrfbFS-GO9EpZCTN7A

entry.summary: We've just opened up ~ 40 more spots for our @CoinbaseCloud X D_D @vibesIRL party tonight 👀 Two free party busses 🚌 to the venue, pickups at 6pm and ~ 6:30pm from: 1️⃣ Agora Conference Center 2️⃣ Grand Hyatt Hotel First come, first serve 🫡 RSVP https://lu.ma/D_D-Bog
